featured.text: We eat polluted dairy products and meat and take the dioxin into our bodies, where it is stored in our fat for years and builds up over time.

definition.zh_def: 受到污染的，通常指環境或物質中含有有害物質。
definition.en_def: Contaminated with harmful substances, typically referring to the environment or materials.
definition.example: The river was polluted by industrial waste.
